help-file.title: "FAERIE FIRE"
help-file.content:
Syntax: inn faerie <victim> (for Drow Elf) Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
"Faerie Fire" causes the target's armor class to increase for a limited time, making it easier to hit. The Faeries being fey in their way may sometimes accidentally reveal more than should be seen when this spell is cast.
